detail_desc: Short, boxy jacket in a woven wool blend with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, and buttoned cuffs. Lined.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket.

Coat in woven fabric made from a felted wool blend with a stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Diagonal, welt front pockets, two inner pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Long-sleeved top in soft fabric with narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Patterned swimsuit with flounce-trimmed shoulder straps.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Jacket in woven fabric with a concealed two-way zip down the front and a lined stand-up collar with fasteners. Long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs, flap side pockets with a button, and a ribbed hem. Lined.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Shopper in imitation leather covered in braided plastic. Metal decoration on the front, two handles at the top, a wide tab with a magnetic fastener, and one inner compartment.
Shirt in soft cotton denim with a collar. Open chest pocket, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. The cotton content of the shirt is partly recycled.
Fitted, one-shoulder jersey top.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with peak lapels, welt front pockets and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Lined bikini top with adjustable shoulder straps and underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. No fasteners.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short-sleeved, patterned sports top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric. Regular fit. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Sleeveless top in ribbed jersey with a concealed zip at the back of the neck and short slits in the sides.

Shorts in soft cotton piqué with an elasticated waist and fake fly with a decorative button. Side pockets, a fake flap pocket with a button front and back, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Detachable, adjustable braces.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Grosgrain-covered Alice band with glittery appliqués at the top.
Dress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with long sleeves, a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Swim trousers and top in UV-protective fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves and a small collar. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front. UPF 50.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Set of a hoodie and leggings in a soft, fine, rib-knit viscose blend. Long-sleeved hoodie with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Skinny fit leggings with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Velour soft toy wearing a removable all-in-one suit. Polyester filling. Size approx. 25 cm.
Hooded jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with an elastic strap over the foot. Satin linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Triangle bikini top with decorative straps at the hem, lined cups, wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a plastic fastening at the back.
Jeans in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets, back pockets, and wide, tapered legs.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with front and back pockets, a fake fly with a button, and tapered legs.
Jeans in supersoft, washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and fake fly with a press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs with straight-cut hems.
Sleeveless nightdress in soft organic cotton jersey with a lined top and wrapover front for easier nursing access. Elasticated seam under the bust and a lace-trimmed hem.
Hipster briefs in lace and microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Cap with a lightly padded front and mesh back. Covered elastication at the back.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a waistband and half-elasticated hems.
Rain jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with a drawstring hood, press-studs down the front, flap front pockets with a press-stud and long raglan sleeves. Unlined.
Straight-cut, sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a V-neck and pleat at the front, tie belt at the waist and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Loose-fitting, V-neck T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend.
Sleeveless fitted top in a sturdy rib knit with a slight sheen and a V-neck front and back.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This, combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves, creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Straight-cut T-shirt in jersey made from a cotton blend with cap sleeves and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved dresses in soft, printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist for added width and soft draping.
Jumper in a soft, pattern-knit wool blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jacket in a sturdy, textured weave with a round neck and metal buttons down the front. Contrasting colour details and front pockets with a decorative button. Lined.
5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in imitation leather with a zip fly and button at the waist. Long, slim legs with a seam at the knees and opening at the side of the hem with large press-studs.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Lightly padded, quilted jacket with a lined hood. High collar, zip down the front, chest pocket and zipped side pockets. Lined.
Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, and a fake welt pocket at the back.
Bikini top in sturdy, fast-drying functional fabric with lightly padded triangular cups that provide good support. Wide shoulder straps that cross at the back and a plastic fastener at the back.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, and a lace detail and narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Soft velour slippers in the shape of dinosaurs with appliqués and embroidery. Velour linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Sweatshirt in soft, textured pile with narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short, fitted dress in stretch fabric with a deep V-neck front and back and a horizontal strap at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and gathered seams for a draped effect front and back. Partly lined in jersey.

Long viscose twill parka with a detachable, lined hood in sweatshirt fabric. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and a drawstring at the waist. Flap chest pockets, patch front pockets with a flap, ribbed cuffs and an elasticated hem.
Slip-on suede trainers with elastication and a decorative, sewn-on knot detail at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and thick thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Cardigan in a soft fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a visible seam at the back and no buttons.
Shorts in soft cotton twill. High paper bag waist with covered elastication, a small frill trim and detachable D-ring belt. Fake fly and flap leg pockets.
Short, fitted dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a draped, wrapover front with a knot detail at one side.
Cardigan knitted in a soft viscose blend with a V-neck front and back, press-studs down the front, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.
Jumper in a soft knit with pointelle and cable-knit sections. Long sleeves, a seam at the waist with a flared peplum, and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Calf-length dress in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, long raglan sleeves, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and short slits in the sides.
Block-striped jumper in a fine knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Classic jacket in woven fabric with a chest pocket and flap front pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Set with a top and trousers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with long sleeves, a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1-4Y) and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
All-in-one suit in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems, and press-studs on one shoulder, at the crotch and down the legs. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved top in airy jersey with a decorative seam at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, glittery sections, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Hi-tops in imitation suede with a padded edge, elasticated lacing at the front, loop at the back and fabric detail on the tongue. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Short dress in patterned plumeti chiffon with short, softly draping sleeves and an open section at the back with a covered button at the back of the neck. Gathered seam under the bust, a concealed zip at the back and a gently flared skirt. Lined in jersey made from recycled polyester.
Tailored trousers in a stretch weave with two press-studs at the waist and a zip fly. Zipped front pockets, fake welt back pockets and slim, straight legs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, ties at the sides, overlocked frilled edges and a gathered seam at the back.
Briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Full-length skirt in airy chiffon doubled with a layer of tulle. Grosgrain at the waist and a concealed zip at the back. Jersey lining.
Padded gilet with a detachable hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Lined.
